channel.title: Christmas Cracker help
channel.description: How can i add it so when you use the cracker on a player it gives them a random partyhat. The source is a pi and a 317. Im trying to get back into coding :/

item.title: Christmas Cracker help
item.dc:creator: @drew56133 drew56133
item.description:
@drew56133 wrote:

[quote=“N3wc0d3r, post:3, topic:471426”] public static int partyhats[] = { a, b, c, d, e, f }; //Items a, b, c, d, e, and f are partyhats
This code is here so it states which items are considered partyhats.

public static int randomPartyhats() {
    return partyhats[(int) (Math.random() * partyhats.length)]; //From partyhats, it gives either a, b, c, d, e, or f randomly. 
}

This code is here so when you call randomPartyhats() that it takes the IDs from partyhats and randomizes which item you get.

if (usedItem == xxxx) { //If the item you use has ID xxxx
    deleteItem(xxxx, 1); //Deletes item xxxx
    addItem(randomPartyhats(), 1); //Adds 1 of the items from randomPartyhats
}

This would be the code for actually using the item on the player and getting a random partyhat.[/quote]Where do i add this?

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Cracker help
item.dc:creator: @N3wc0d3r N3wc0d3r
item.description:
@N3wc0d3r wrote:

public static int partyhats[] = 
{ a, b, c, d, e, f }; //Items a, b, c, d, e, and f are partyhats

This code is here so it states which items are considered partyhats.

public static int randomPartyhats() {
    return partyhats[(int) (Math.random() * partyhats.length)]; //From partyhats, it gives either a, b, c, d, e, or f randomly. 
}

This code is here so when you call randomPartyhats() that it takes the IDs from partyhats and randomizes which item you get.

if (usedItem == xxxx) { //If the item you use has ID xxxx
    deleteItem(xxxx, 1); //Deletes item xxxx
    addItem(randomPartyhats(), 1); //Adds 1 of the items from randomPartyhats
}

This would be the code for actually using the item on the player and getting a random partyhat.

Read full topic
